description.value:
You gain a vial of cure-all as a secondary tool. You can spend 1 minute to apply it to an ally, removing one of the following conditions: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}. If the ally was @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, they also gain @Damage[1[healing]]{1 Hit Point}. The target is then temporarily immune to cure-alls for 24 hours.

Reinforced You can instead use a cure-all to attempt to counteract any one affliction applied by the creature the trophy was @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.rr-playtest-actions.Item.xCzDScyYpmhxPNTF]{Claimed} from, using your Class DC â€“ 10 as your counteract check modifier.
